entities.description: The relationship between the victim and the offender.
An individual who has been harmed or affected by an offense.
An individual who has committed an offense.
The raw count of cases without any statistical weighting.
The percentage of total cases for each type of victim-offender relationship.

relationships.description: Defines the relationship of the victim to the offender.
Shows the unweighted count of cases for each victim-offender relationship.
Shows the percentage of total cases for each victim-offender relationship.
